Package net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SQLightable
    Designates a class as a data container which can be used in a database defined and managed by SQLiteHouse.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomLensTest
    Exercises features added to SQLiteHouse and SQLiteColumn to support definition of custom field refractors.
    CustomLensTest.CustomStringLens
    An entirely silly implementation of a string lens, which substitutes the word "Sparkles" for any value.
    CustomLensTest.Sparkle
    Data table class for the database which tests custom refractors.
    CustomLensTest.SparkleDB
    Database specification for the database which tests custom refractors.
    RefractorMapTest
    Exercises RefractorMap
    SQLiteHouse<DSC extends SQLiteHouse>
    Uses custom annotations to automatically construct and manage SQLite databases with tables in which each row holds a serialization of a specified Java class.
    SQLiteHouse.ColumnIndexComparator
    Used by SQLiteHouse to sort the indices and/or names of columns within a table specification.
    SQLiteHouse.Factory
    Creates instances of a SQLiteHouse.
    SQLiteHouse.QueryContext<DBH extends SQLiteHouse>
    A short-lived, open data structure which provides context for various operations within the class.
    SQLiteHouseTest
    Exercises SQLiteHouse.
    SQLiteHouseTest.NoIntrospectionClass
    Used by SQLiteHouseTest.testFactoryFailureFromNoAnnotation() to verify that the SQLiteHouse.Factory will refuse to process a class that is not properly annotated.
    SQLiteHouseTest.UpgradeSpecClass  
    SQLiteHouseTest.ValidSpecClass
    Used as the canonical "valid" SQLiteHouse implementation for various unit tests.
